name: CarChat
0:
”Alexa, open Car Chat”
”Alexa, Start Car Chat”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: car chat
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Communicate with other cars through your Amazon Alexa or Echo Auto device.

Hear from other drivers around you, create your own posts for others to hear, tune in to different channels, and set up a profile- all hands-free while you’re driving! Try it out!

The make and model you provided in your profile may be shared with other users. Your location is not shared with other users.

We’d love to hear your suggestions. Email us at TDuval@JumbleQueen.com

Follow us on Twitter! 
 
https://twitter.com/CarChatAlexa
